summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 19 miles), dew point temperature (up 4.4°C), feels like temperature (up 3.4°C), and outside temperature (up 3.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 227.9m higher than yesterday, 51.5m higher than past week, 68.7m higher than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 424m to a maximum of 972m, averaging 916.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 864.5m and 847.3m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels and gentle breezes are expected. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather patterns to stay the same.
